name: Miano Evalyne
description: Miano is passionate about sustainability and conservation. She enjoys exploring Kenya's landscapes through hiking and biking, which fuels her commitment to environmental issues. Miano also engages in fitness and women's empowerment, mentoring younger girls and organizing community activities.

name: Ramani Valarine
description: Ramani, a psychology graduate, is dedicated to mental health and emotional well-being. She volunteers at clinics, organizes workshops, and stays updated on psychological research. Enjoying meditation and yoga, Ramani combines her empathy and knowledge to support and empower others while promoting mental health awareness.

name: Maritim Mitchelle
description: Maritim is focused on energy innovation and sustainability, using her analytical skills to enhance efficiency and reduce environmental impact in the oil and gas industry. She actively mentors youth and supports education and conservation efforts, showing strong leadership and a commitment to positive change
